meanings.definition: The front part of a person's body.
meanings.sent1: She held her hands over her forebodies to protect herself.
meanings.sent2: His necklace rested gently on his forebodies.
meanings.sent3: The cat stretched out lazily, showing off its fluffy forebodies.
meanings.sent4: The sun's rays kissed her forebodies, warming her skin.
meanings.sent5: The child hugged his teddy bear close to his forebodies.

meanings.definition: The front part of a ship.
meanings.sent1: The waves crashed against the forebodies of the ship.
meanings.sent2: The sailors stood at the bow, gazing out from the forebodies.
meanings.sent3: The seagull perched on the forebodies, enjoying the view.
meanings.sent4: The forebodies cut through the water like a sharp knife.
meanings.sent5: The captain stood proudly at the helm, guiding the forebodies of the ship.
